name: Black Code
description:
This is Black Code, a simple platformer game i did for study. I used it to learn Unity(5.5), and implement some concepts i wanted to practice: managers, holding data between scenes, particles, effects, multiple hitboxes, picking up items, and some movement ideas. 
The assets are all made by me except the music.

Features:

- 3 levels with unique bosses

- 3 different enemies with different behaviours

- 3 difficulty levels, variying levels layout and enemy AI

- 5 powerups and 2 health items

- And simple platformer fun!

If you have any question feel free to contact me!
